heading: HB05214
0: AN ACT MANDATING THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND THE LOCAL GOVERNMENT UNITS OF CITIES AND MUNICIPALITIES TO PROVIDE DIGITAL X-RAYS AND SPUTUM TESTING LABORATORIES IN THEIR LOCAL PUBLIC HEALTH CENTERS NATIONWIDE TO MAINTAIN FREE X-RAY AND SPUTUM TEST SERVICES TO THE COMMUNITIES AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
status: Pending with the Committee on HEALTH since 2019-11-06
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05214
FULL TITLE : AN ACT MANDATING THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND THE LOCAL GOVERNMENT UNITS OF CITIES AND MUNICIPALITIES TO PROVIDE DIGITAL X-RAYS AND SPUTUM TESTING LABORATORIES IN THEIR LOCAL PUBLIC HEALTH CENTERS NATIONWIDE TO MAINTAIN FREE X-RAY AND SPUTUM TEST SERVICES TO THE COMMUNITIES AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR

SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
